Fields in game declared as Piece

          An array of Piece-objects depicting the board and the pieces on it
 

Fields in game with type parameters of type Piece
private  java.util.List<Piece> Board.deadPieces
          A list of pieces that have been defeated during the course of the game
 

Methods in game that return Piece
private  Piece Board.askPiece(java.util.List<Piece> pieces, java.lang.String message)
          A method that prompts an InputDialog asking for the Player to choose a piece from the list.
 Piece Faction.getEquivalent(Piece piece, boolean team)
          A method that gives an equivalent of a piece given as parametre, but which affiliates with the calling Faction.
 Piece[] Faction.getOfficers(int row, int column, boolean team, Board board)
          Returns an array containing an instance of all the officer (i.e. not a Pawn or a King) pieces of the calling faction.
 Piece Board.getPiece(int row, int column)
          Returns the piece located in the square defined by the coordinates given as parametres.
(package private)  Piece Board.reanimatePiece(boolean team, Faction faction)
          A method that compiles a list of Pieces that can be reanimated by the given team and then sends forward a request for the player to choose s piece to be reanimated.
(package private)  Piece Board.resurrectPiece(boolean team)
          A method that compiles a list of pieces that can be resurrected by the given team and then sends forward a request for the player to choose one from the list.

(package private)  int Piece.damage(Piece attacker)
          A method used to damage the Piece accordingly to the attack power of the Piece given as parametre.
 Piece Faction.getEquivalent(Piece piece, boolean team)
          A method that gives an equivalent of a piece given as parametre, but which affiliates with the calling Faction.
static java.awt.Image GraphicConstants.getImage(Piece piece)
          A static method that returns the Image associated with the Piece given as parametre.
(package private)  void Board.movePiece(Piece piece, int row, int column)
          A method that moves the given Piece-object to the defined square in the board, if the PIece is associated with the Board.
(package private)  boolean Board.removeDeadPiece(Piece piece)
          Removes the given Piece-object from the deadPieces-list if the given Piece is on the list.
(package private)  void Board.setPiece(Piece piece, int row, int column)
          Puts the given Piece-object into the square defined by the given coordinates if the Piece is associated with this Board.
